Name: Secret in Story
About the game: Game Introduction Accompanied by beautiful piano music, you begin to experience a wonderful love journey. There is no dialogue in the story, only pictures intertwined with montage techniques. Players need to unlock each puzzle to open every door of memory, to find the youth that we have been missing. Game Features A game with montage techniques Beautiful piano music Challenging puzzles
Meta Title: Secret in Story: Jun 19, 2017, Luo Zhi En and Full Overview
